div.p: code: Discrete variation analysis overall interpretation
subject: Generated Summary: Medical Record Number: m123 (USUAL); Adam B. Everyman ; gender: male; birthDate: 1951-01-20
specimen: Generated Summary: status: available; Tissue

tr.td: Based on the genotype result, this patient is predicted to have a CYP2C19 poor metabolizer phenotype. This genotype information can be used by patients and clinicians as part of the shared decision-making process for several drugs metabolized by CYP2C19 including clopidogrel, voriconazole, amitriptyline, citalopram and escitalopram.
